26 March 2014

Communications

Email, hipchat, github, basecamp, IM, two* separate instances of Chatter, and an internal project management tool.

This is a comprehensive list of products my design team uses to communicate about projects we are working on.

This smells like a broken system. I think there is a better way.

* Seriously two

Find something wrong?
Send a pull request or open an issue on Github
